> Dph, if you want to help us out at the Gladiator clone project on  
Sourceforge, you're very welcome to join. If you're intersted, make 
an account on Sourceforge and email me or post to the forums or 
something, and I'll hook you up.

Admittedly, the only thing I can readily contribute is the list of 
changes and the order in which to do them.

Believe or not, your moderator of this group feels overcommitted 
working on some projects within TGS staff - tgs.gargoyles-fans.org 
- and not all of the work that I am doing will be visible within 
stories.  Even worse, I see no immediate end to my overcommitment 
because I have yet another project sitting on the back burner that I 
will pursue once I lower my level of committment.
